title: Hidden Secrets - Part 36 - Arrival of The AntiChrist - Doc Marqu
description:
Description

 							 
  Joseph Doc Marquis Aliens Fallen Angels Antichrist Conspiracy collection
  
 
Joseph "Doc" Marquis (born 26 October 1956) is a Christian writer who claims to be an ex-member of the Illuminati.
According to his version of events, he was initiated into the group at the age of four by his foster aunt, became a high
priest at thirteen and a master witch at seventeen before eventually leaving in 1979. He claims that, since then, the
Illuminati has tried to kill him. In response, Marquis declares that "God won't allow" him to be killed. 
  
 
Doc Marquis is a former Satanist who was trained in the Illuminati Plan before he came out of the coven to become a
Christian. In 1992, Doc was hired by the Boston Police Department to train their homicide detectives how to spot
evidences in a crime scene that the perpetrator was a practicing occultist. Doc also has appeared on the following TV
shows: Oprah Winfrey; Geraldo Rivera; Hard Copy; Inside Edition; Unsolved Mysteries, 20/20 He is the author of numerous
books, video tapes and audio cassette series and has appeared as an expert witness in a number of documentaries
